description.zh: HeyForm 是一个开源的表单构建工具，允许用户创建互动式的对话式表单，用于调查、问卷、测验和投票。无需编码技能，用户即可通过直观界面轻松设计和定制表单。平台还支持数据分析与导出，非常适合收集和处理用户反馈。
description.en: HeyForm is an open-source form builder that enables users to create interactive conversational forms for surveys, questionnaires, quizzes, and polls. It requires no coding skills and offers a user-friendly interface for form creation and customization. The platform supports data analysis and export, making it ideal for gathering and acting on user feedback.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 无需编码即可创建表单
- 适合各类技能水平的用户使用
- 支持品牌定制，提升专业形象
- 提供深入的数据分析与便捷的数据导出功能

## 功能列表:

- 支持多种输入类型，包括文本、邮箱、电话、日期选择、文件上传和图片选项
- 支持条件逻辑和URL跳转，实现动态表单
- 可集成 Webhook、分析工具、营销平台及 Zapier 和 Make.com
- 可自定义视觉主题，支持CSS高级样式定制
- 提供详细的分析数据，如流失率和完成率
- 支持将表单结果导出为CSV文件进行后续分析
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- No coding required for form creation
- Accessible to users of all skill levels
- Supports brand customization for professional appearance
- Offers insightful data analytics and easy data export

## Features:

- Wide variety of input types including text, email, phone, date pickers, file uploads, and picture choices
- Conditional logic and URL redirection for dynamic forms
- Integrations with webhooks, analytics, marketing platforms, Zapier, and Make.com
- Customizable visual themes and advanced theming with custom CSS
- Detailed analytics including drop-off rates and completion tracking
- Export form results to CSV for further analysis
